mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, member_name, member_password, email_id, email_domain, member_birth, image_url, join_date) values (#{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{memberPassword}, #{emailId}, #{emailDomain}, #{memberBirth}, #{imageUrl}, #{joinDate})
mapper.select: select member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, member_password as memberPassword, email_id as emailId, email_domain as emailDomain, member_birth as memberBirth, image_url as imageUrl, join_date as joinDate from member where member_id = #{memberId} and member_password = #{memberPassword}

select member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, member_password as memberPassword, email_id as emailId, email_domain as emailDomain, member_birth as memberBirth, image_url as imageUrl, join_date as joinDate from member where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: update member set member_name = #{memberName}, member_password = #{memberPassword}, email_id = #{emailId}, email_domain = #{emailDomain}, member_birth = #{memberBirth}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, join_date = #{joinDate} where member_id = #{memberId}
